definition: to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
surname Lan/abbr. for Lanzhou 蘭州|兰州[Lan2 zhou1], Gansu
orchid (蘭花|兰花 Cymbidium goeringii)/fragrant thoroughwort (蘭草|兰草 Eupatorium fortunei)/lily magnolia (木蘭|木兰)
fragrant/sweet smelling/aromatic/savory or appetizing/(to eat) with relish/(of sleep) sound/perfume or spice/joss or incense stick/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: There are large amount of monoterpenes in Mentha haplocalyx Briq. and Mentha spicata L.
sentences.chinese: 薄荷和留兰香挥发油成分中含大量单萜类物质。

sentences.english: The plants of Mentha haplocalyx Briq. and Mentha spicata L.
sentences.chinese: 薄荷和留兰香为薄荷属多年生草本植物。

sentences.english: Finally, using way of GC analyses authenticates the extracting spearmint oil.
sentences.chinese: 采用GC分析鉴定所提取的留兰香油的成分。

sentences.english: He bent down to regard a lean file of spearmint growing by the wall.
sentences.chinese: 他弯下身去望着沿墙稀稀疏疏地长着的一排留兰香。

sentences.english: Metha spicata L. is a perennial aromatic plant.
sentences.chinese: 留兰香是多年生草本芳香植物。

definition: aromatic herb/vanilla/alternative name for Eupatorium fortunei/(fig.) loyal and dependable person (old)
Labiatae, the taxonomic family including lavender, mint
